<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[First World Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=28) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 44 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your connection to the [First World](/Planes.aspx?ID=10) grants you a primal innate spell, much like those of the [fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69). Choose one cantrip from the [primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) spell list. You can cast this spell as a primal innate spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.
name: First World Magic
